title: Loving Hut
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for vegetarian living. Each location is individual family owned and operated. Serves food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages, and more. Small menu includes some photos. Rice, noodle, hot pots, faux meat plates. Prices cheap to moderate. Bright space, casual. Non-dairy ice cream and sorbet available. Air conditioned. Address in Chinese: 彰化市陳稜路39號, name 愛家國際連鎖餐飲.
